description: Main entry point for the Flutter app implementing the 2048 game UI, setting up theme, provider, and layout.

classes.name: MyApp
classes.description: Root widget of the application setting up theme and state management with Provider.

classes.name: _RootScaffold
classes.description: Main scaffold widget that structures the game layout, including score, board, and control components.

methods.description: Application entry point that initializes and runs the Flutter app.

methods.name: build
